segments.text: Okay, so I see two kids and an adult in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is busy at the sink, drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the real action is happening over by the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy on a stool, reaching for a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar and the other holding a plate, very resourceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there with him, eagerly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her arm is raised, hand open, anticipating a sweet treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a classic scene of childhood mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're clearly working together on this secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost taste those freshly baked cookies just looking at them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so clever, taking advantage of the distraction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with a few before they're caught.
segments.speaker: PAR
